X-Scissor.Long-Range: A long-range x-scissor that slashes at distant foes with scissor-like energy.
X-Scissor.Area-of-Effect (AoE): An AoE x-scissor that affects all enemies within its range with multiple cross-slashes.

Yawn.Close Combat: A close-range move that induces drowsiness and sleep.
Yawn.Melee: A special attack that causes the target to fall asleep.
Yawn.Mid-Range: A mid-range yawn that makes the target drowsy and susceptible to sleep.
Yawn.Long-Range: A long-range yawn that affects distant foes by inducing sleepiness.
Yawn.Area-of-Effect (AoE): An AoE yawn that causes all enemies within its range to become drowsy and eventually fall asleep.

Zap Cannon.Close Combat: A close-range move that releases a powerful electric blast.
Zap Cannon.Melee: A special electric attack that deals high damage and paralyzes the opponent.
Zap Cannon.Mid-Range: A mid-range zap cannon that delivers a devastating electric shock.
Zap Cannon.Long-Range: A long-range zap cannon that strikes distant foes with intense electrical energy.
Zap Cannon.Area-of-Effect (AoE): An AoE zap cannon that affects all enemies within its range with a powerful electric blast.

Zen Headbutt.Close Combat: A close-range move that uses a psychic headbutt to strike.
Zen Headbutt.Melee: A special psychic attack that deals damage and may cause confusion.
Zen Headbutt.Mid-Range: A mid-range zen headbutt that hits the target with psychic force.
Zen Headbutt.Long-Range: A long-range zen headbutt that affects distant foes with a psychic-powered strike.
Zen Headbutt.Area-of-Effect (AoE): An AoE zen headbutt that impacts all enemies within its range with psychic force.

Zing Zap.Close Combat: A close-range move that delivers a quick, electric zap.
Zing Zap.Melee: A special electric attack that deals high-speed damage and may cause paralysis.
Zing Zap.Mid-Range: A mid-range zing zap that strikes with a fast electrical burst.
Zing Zap.Long-Range: A long-range zing zap that hits enemies from afar with a rapid electric charge.
Zing Zap.Area-of-Effect (AoE): An AoE zing zap that affects all foes within its range with a quick electrical burst.

Zippy Zap.Close Combat: A close-range move that delivers a speedy, electric jolt.
Zippy Zap.Melee: A special electric attack that deals rapid, high-damage bursts.
Zippy Zap.Mid-Range: A mid-range zippy zap that releases a fast and potent electrical strike.
Zippy Zap.Long-Range: A long-range zippy zap that strikes distant foes with a speedy electric attack.
Zippy Zap.Area-of-Effect (AoE): An AoE zippy zap that impacts all enemies within its range with a swift electrical charge.
